function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Correlation analyses used to evaluate association between quantitative variables","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of relationship between variables","Mitigation":"Use additional statistical methods such as regression analysis for more accurate assessment","Technologies":"Statistical software for regression analysis","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Assumptions for Kruskal-Wallis H test may not have been met","Impact":"Invalid results from the test","Mitigation":"Review assumptions and consider alternative non-parametric tests if assumptions are not met","Technologies":"Statistical software for non-parametric tests","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"No statistically significant difference in impact score between rounds in Group A","Impact":"Failure to identify differences in impact over time","Mitigation":"Consider alternative statistical methods for analyzing time effects","Technologies":"Statistical software for time series analysis","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research team"}]}
